brief_title: MK-7625A Versus Meropenem in Pediatric Participants With Complicated Urinary Tract Infection (cUTI) (MK-7625A-034)
official_title: A Phase 2, Randomized, Active Comparator-Controlled, Multicenter, Double-Blind Clinical Trial to Study the Safety and Efficacy of Ceftolozane/Tazobactam (MK-7625A) Versus Meropenem in Pediatric Subjects With Complicated Urinary Tract Infection, Including Pyelonephritis
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with one or more AEs
primary_outcome.description.1: Number of participants who discontinued study drug due to an AE
date_disclaimer: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 26, 2017
